tuv.seg: Children and rights in Ireland
Leanaí agus cearta in Éirinn
In Ireland under the Child Care Act 1991, the Children Act 2001 and the United Nations Convention on the Rights of the Child a child is defined as anyone under the age of 18
In Éirinn, déantar leanbh a shainiú faoin Acht um Chúram Leanaí 1991, Acht na Leanaí 2001 agus Coinbhinsiún na Náisiún Aontaithe um Chearta an Linbh mar dhuine ar bith atá faoi 18 mbliana d’aois
Unless you are or were married, you cannot enter a legally binding contract until you are aged 18, except for certain contracts such as for apprenticeships or for necessities like food

Mura bhfuil tú nó mura raibh tú pósta, ní féidir leat conradh a dhéanamh atá ina cheangal de réir an dlí go dtí go mbíonn tú 18 mbliana d’aois, seachas conarthaí áirithe, mar a bhaineann le riachtanais cosúil le bia nó do phrintíseachtaí
What a child is allowed to do is restricted by his/her age
Bíonn srian aoise ar an méid a cheadaítear do leanbh a dhéanamh
This document provides information on such issues that can have an impact on a child’s life
Cuireann an doiciméad seo eolas ar fáil faoi cheisteanna mar sin a mbíonn tionchar acu ar shaol an linbh
The Irish education system is made up of primary, second-level, third-level and further education
Cuimsíonn córas oideachais na hÉireann an bhunscoil, scoil dara leibhéal, tríú leibhéal agus breisoideachas
Children can attend primary school from the age of 4
Féadfaidh leanaí freastal ar an mbunscoil ó 4 bliana d’aois ar aghaidh
To attend second-level they must be aged 12 on 1 January in the first school year of attendance
Caithfidh leanaí a bheith 12 bliana d’aois ar an 1 Eanáir sa chéad bhliain scoile ag an dara leibhéal
There is also an Early Childhood Care and Education Scheme for children of pre-school age
Tá freisin Cúram Luath-Óige agus Scéim Oideachais do leanaí aois réamhscoile
To be eligible for the scheme they must be at least 3 years of age
Ní mór dóibh a bheith ar a laghad 3 bliana d’aois
Attendance at school (or receiving an education) is compulsory from the age of 6 up to age 16 or until students have completed 3 years of second-level education, whichever is the later
Bíonn tinreamh scoile (nó oideachas a fháil) éigeantach ó 6 bliana d’aois go dtí 16 bliana d’aois nó go dtí go gcríochnaíonn mic léinn 3 bliana den oideachas dara leibhéal, cibé is déanaí
There is no compulsory early childhood education
Níl aon oideachas luath-óige éigeantach i gceist
Tusla - the Child and Family Agency - is the national agency established to ensure that every child attends school regularly, or otherwise receives an appropriate minimum education
Is é an Ghníomhaireach um Leanaí agus an Teaghleach (Tusla) an ghníomhaireacht náisiúnta a bunaíodh le cinntiú go bhfreastalaíonn leanaí ar scoil go rialta nó go bhfaigheann siad oideachas mar is cuí
• Monitors school attendance, and takes a range of measures where children do not attend school
• Déanann siad monatóireacht ar thinreamh scoile, agus glacann siad raon bearta i gcásanna nach bhfreastalaíonn leanaí ar an scoil
• Maintains a register of children who are not attending a recognised school
• Coinníonn sé clár de leanaí nach bhfuil ag freastal ar scoil aitheanta

• Maintains a register of children aged 16 and 17 who leave school early to take up employment and makes arrangements for their continuing education and training in consultation with providers and employers

• Coinníonn sé clár de leanaí atá 16 agus 17 mbliana d’aois a fhágann an scoil go luath le dhul ag obair agus déanann sé socruithe maidir lena n-oideachas agus oiliúint leanúnach i gcomhar le soláthraithe agus fostóirí
Parents and guardians have a legal obligation to ensure that their child attends a school or otherwise receives an education
Tá dualgas reachtúil ar thuismitheoirí agus ar chaomhnóirí a chinntiú go bhfreastalaíonn a gcuid leanaí ar scoil nó go bhfaigheann siad oideachas ar bhealach éigin eile
If Tusla considers that the parents are failing in their obligation, it sends the parents a School Attendance Notice warning and if the parents fail to comply, they may be prosecuted

Má mheasann an Tusla go bhfuil teipthe ar thuismitheoirí an dualgas sin a chomhlíonadh, seoltar rabhadh chuig tuismitheoirí trí Fhógra Tinreamh Scoile, agus má theipeann ar thuismitheoirí cloí le sonraí an fhógra ina dhiaidh sin, féadfar iad a ionchúiseamh
Further information is available in our document on school attendance
Tá tuilleadh eolais ar fáil inár ndoiciméad maidir le tinreamh scoile
The Board also intervenes in relation to proposed school expulsions
Déanann an Bord idirghabháil i ndáil le díbirtí ón scoil atá beartaithe freisin
Further information is available in our document, Overview of the Irish education system
Tuilleadh eolais ar fáil inár ndoiciméad, Forbhreathnú ar chóras oideachais na hÉireann
Under the Protection of Young Persons (Employment) Act 1996 employers cannot employ children under age 16 in regular full-time jobs
Faoin Acht um Chosaint Daoine Óga (Fostaíocht), 1996, ní féidir le fostóirí leanaí faoi bhun 16 bliana d’aois a fhostú i bpoist lánaimseartha
Children under age 14 cannot be employed
Ní féidir le leanaí faoi bhun 14 bliana d’aois a bheith fostaithe
Children aged 14 and 15 may be employed as follows:
Féadfaidh leanaí atá 14 agus 15 bliana d’aois a bheith fostaithe mar a leanas:
• Doing light work during the school holidays – they must have at least 21 days off work during this time
• Is féidir leo obair éadrom a dhéanamh le linn laethanta saoire scoile amháin - caithfidh siad 21 lá saor a bheith acu i rith an ama sin
• As part of an approved work experience or educational programme where the work is not harmful to their health, safety or development
• Caithfidh siad a bheith rannpháirteach i gclár oideachais nó taithí oibre atá faofa agus nach ndéanann díobháil do chúrsaí sláinte, sábháilteachta nó forbartha
• In film, cultural, advertising work or sport under licences issued by the Minister for Jobs, Enterprise and Innovation
• Obair scannánaíochta, chultúrtha, fhógraíochta nó spóirt faoi cheadúnais atá eisithe ag an Aire Post, Fiontar agus Nuálaíochta
Children aged 15 may do 8 hours a week light work in school term time
Féadfaidh leanaí atá 15 bliana d’aois 8 n-uaire in aghaidh na seachtaine d’obair éadrom a dhéanamh le linn téarma na scoile
The maximum working week for children outside school term time is 35 hours or up to 40 hours if they are on approved work experience
Is é an líon uaireanta ar a mhéid in aghaidh na seachtaine do leanaí lasmuigh de théarma na scoile ná 35 uair nó suas le 40 uair más taithí oibre atá faofa atá i gceist
The maximum working week for children aged 16 and 17 is 40 hours with a maximum of 8 hours a day
Is é an líon uaireanta ar a mhéid in aghaidh na seachtaine do leanaí atá 16 agus 17 mbliana d’aois ná 40 uair agus uasmhéid 8 n-uaire in aghaidh an lae
Further information is available in our documents, Hours of work for young people and Rights of young workers
Tuilleadh eolais ar fáil inár ndoiciméad, Uaireanta oibre do dhaoine óga agus Cearta oibrithe óga

The National Minimum Wage Act 2000 provides that the minimum wage rate for an experienced adult employee since January 2017 is €9.25 an hour, where an experienced adult employee is an employee who has an employment of any kind in any 2 years over the age of 18

Déanann an tAcht um Pá Íosta Náisiúnta 2000 foráil ó mhí Eanáir 2017 go mbeidh an ráta íosphá d’fhostaí aosach le taithí cothrom le €9.15 san uair, nuair a bhíonn fostaíocht de chineál ar bith ag fostaí aosach le taithí in aon 2 bhliain ar leith os cionn 18 mbliana d’aois
An employee under age 18 is entitled to €6.48 per hour or 70% of the minimum wage
Bíonn fostaí faoi bhun 18 mbliana d’aois i dteideal €6.48 san uair nó 70% den phá íosta náisiúnta
An employer can pay more
Féadfaidh fostóir níos mó ná sin a íoc
An employee is entitled to 80% and 90% of the minimum wage respectively in the first two years of employment over age 18
Bheadh an fostaí i dteideal 80% agus 90% faoi seach den íosphá náisiúnta sa chéad dhá bhliain fostaíochta os cionn 18 mbliana d’aois
You can find out more about the National Minimum Wage in our document, Minimum rates of pay in Ireland
Is féidir tuilleadh eolais a fháil faoin Íosphá Náisiúnta inár ndoiciméad, Rátaí pá íosta in Éirinn
Apprenticeships and other careers
Printíseachtaí agus gairmeacha eile
The minimum age you can pursue certain careers is as follows:
Seo a leanas an aois íosta gur féidir dul le gairmeacha áirithe:
• You can become a SOLAS apprentice at age 16
• Is féidir leat a bheith mar phrintíseach le SOLAS ag 16 bliana d’aois
• You can become an apprentice in the Army or Air Corps at age 18
• Is féidir leat a bheith mar phrintíseach san Arm nó san Aerchór ag 18 mbliana d’aois
• You can join the Army, Air Corps and Naval Service at age 18
• Is féidir leat dul isteach san Arm, san Aerchóir agus sa tSeirbhís Chabhlaigh ag 18 mbliana d’aois
• You can join the Garda Síochána at age 18
• Is féidir leat dul isteach sna Gardaí Síochána ag 18 mbliana d’aois
(The babysitter's level of maturity and competence are the main attributes a parent should consider)
Níl aon íos-aois dhlíthiúil ann maidir le feighleoireacht leanaí
When working, you start paying social insurance contributions from 16 years of age
Nuair a bhíonn duine ag obair, tosaíonn siad ag déanamh ranníocaíochtaí árachais shóisialta ag 16 bliana d’aois
However, you cannot claim an unemployment payment, such as Jobseeker’s Benefit or Jobseeker’s Allowance, until age 18
Mar sin féin, ní féidir íocaíochtaí dífhostaíochta a éileamh, cosúil le Sochar Cuardaitheora Poist nó Liúntas Cuardaitheora Poist, go dtí 18 mbliana d’aois
You must also meet other criteria in order to qualify
Caithfear critéir eile a shásamh freisin le bheith incháilithe
There is no minimum age at which you are liable to pay tax or the Universal Social Charge
Níl aon aois íosta ag a bhfuil tú faoi dhliteanas cáin a íoc nó chun an Muirear Uilíoch Sóisialach a íoc
There are certain categories of vehicles that a child under 18 is permitted to drive provided he/she has a learner permit or driving licence
Tá catagóirí feithiclí áirithe ann ina gceadaítear do leanbh faoi bhun 18 mbliana d’aois tiomáint nuair a bhíonn ceadúnas foghlaimeora nó ceadúnas tiomána aige/aici
The categories are as follows:
Seo a leanas na catagóirí:

A motorist must pass the driver theory test before applying for a first learner permit
Caithfidh tiománaí an tástáil teoirice tiomána a phasáil sula ndéanann sé/sí iarratas ar an gcéad cheadúnas foghlama
You can take a driver theory test at any age
Is féidir tástáil teoirice tiomána a ghlacadh ag aois ar bith

However, you must submit your pass certificate to a Motor Tax Office with your application for a first learner permit within two years of passing the theory test or the test certificate will have expired

Mar sin féin, caithfear do theastas pas a sheoladh chuig an Oifig Mhótarchánach mar aon leis an iarratas ar an gcéad cheadúnas foghlama laistigh de dhá bhliain ó phasáil na tástála teoirice nó beidh an teastas tástála as dáta
You cannot drive any craft with an engine over 3.7kW (5hp) unless you are at least 12 years of age
Ní féidir leat tiomáint ar bith ceardaíochta le hinneall níos mó ná 3.7kW (5hp) mura rud é go bhfuil tú ar a laghad 12 bliain d'aois
You have to be at least 16 years of age before you can drive a personal watercraft (jet ski) or a powerboat/motorboat that is capable of 17 knots or more
Ní mór duit a bheith ar a laghad 16 bliana d'aois sular féidir leat tiomáint ar árthach uisce pearsanta (scaird sciála) nó cumhacht bád / bád mótair atá in ann 17 muirmhíle nó níos mó
Children cannot book a holiday or a flight until they are 18 years of age
Ní féidir le leanaí saoire nó eitilt a chur in áirithint go dtí go mbíonn siad 18 mbliana d’aois
In general, they cannot travel unaccompanied until they are aged 16
Go ginearálta, ní féidir leo taisteal gan tionlacan go dtí go mbíonn siad 16 bliana d’aois
Otherwise they must be accompanied by someone aged 16 or over
Nó caithfidh leanaí a bheith faoi thionlacan duine atá 16 bliana d’aois nó níos sine
There are two types of passports for children
Tá dhá chineál pas do leanaí ann
Three-year passports are available for children under 3, and five-year passports are available for children aged between 3-17 years. Parental consent is required when applying
Bíonn pasanna trí bliana ar fáil do leanaí faoi bhun 3 bliana d’aois, agus pasanna cúig bliana do leanaí atá idir 3-17 mbliana d’aois
It is not possible to apply online for a passport for someone under 18 years of age
Bíonn toiliú tuismitheora riachtanach nuair atá iarratas á dhéanamh
You can apply for a ten-year passport when you are 18 years of age or over
Féadfar iarratas a dhéanamh ar phas deich mbliana nuair atá tú 18 mbliana d’aois nó níos sine
You have to be at least 18 years of age to apply for an Irish passport card which can be used for travel within the EU/EEA
Caithfidh tú a bheith ar a laghad 18 bliain d'aois sular féidir leat iarratas a dhéanamh ar chárta phas Éireannach gur féidir a úsáid chun taisteal laistigh den AE / LEE
Under the Intoxicating Liquor Act 2003, it is an offence to buy alcohol or for someone to buy it for you, if you are under age 18
Faoi na hAchtanna Deochanna Meisciúla, is cion é alcól a cheannach nó duine a fháil chun alcól a cheannach duit, má bhíonn siad faoi bhun 18 mbliana d’aois
It is also an offence for you to drink alcohol unless you are in a private residence and have your parents’ consent
Is cion é do leanaí alcól a ól mura bhfuil siad i dteach phríobháideach agus toiliú tuismitheora acu
It is an offence for you to be in an off-licence unless you are with a parent or guardian
Is cion é do leanaí a bheith i siopa eischeadúnais mura bhfuil siad in éineacht le tuismitheoir nó caomhnóir
Children are only allowed on licensed premises if they are with a parent or guardian, but this provision carries certain restrictions
Ní cheadaítear do leanaí a bheith ar áitreabh ceadúnaithe ach amháin má bhíonn siad in éineacht le tuismitheoir nó caomhnóir, ach tá srianta áirithe i gceist leis an bhforáil sin

If accompanied by a parent/guardian, a child may remain on the premises up to 9pm (10pm from May to September) unless the licence holder feels this is harmful to the child's health, safety and welfare

Má bhíonn leanbh faoi thionlacan tuismitheora/caomhnóra, féadfar fanacht ar an áitreabh go dtí 9in (10in ó Bhealtaine go Meán Fómhair) mura n-airíonn sealbhóir an cheadúnais go bhféadfaí díobháil a dhéanamh do shláinte, do shábháilteacht agus do leas an linbh
Children aged between 15-17 years may remain on the premises after 9pm where they are attending a private function at which a substantial meal is served
Féadfaidh leanaí atá 15-17 bliana d’aois fanacht ar an áitreabh tar éis 9in nuair a bhíonn siad ag freastal ar ócáid phríobháideach ina bhfuil béile suntasach ar fáil

Under the Intoxicating Liquor Act 2008 the Gardaí have the power to seize alcohol in the possession of a child under 18 years of age where the Gardaí have reasonable cause to believe that the alcohol will be consumed by a child under 18 years in a public place

Faoin Acht Deochanna Meisciúla 2008, tá cumhacht ag na Gardaí alcól a ghabháil nuair a bhíonn sé ag leanbh atá faoi bhun 18 mbliana d’aois agus nuair atá cúis réasúnta acu a chreidiúint go ndéanfaidh leanbh faoi bhun 18 mbliana d’aois alcól a ól in áit phoiblí
Further information is available in our document, Alcohol and the law
Tuilleadh eolais ar fáil inár ndoiciméad, Alcól agus an dlí
Under the Public Health (Tobacco) Act 2002 it is an offence to sell cigarettes or other tobacco products to anyone under the age of 18
Faoin Acht Sláinte Poiblí (Tobac) 2002, is cion é toitíní nó táirgí tobac eile a dhíol le duine ar bith faoi 18 mbliana d’aois
If you are under 18 years of age, from January 2016 you cannot smoke in a car
Má tá tú faoi 18 mbliana d'aois, ón Eanáir 2016 ní féidir leat deataigh i gcarr
Also, no one else can smoke while you are in the car
Ina theannta sin, ní féidir aon duine eile deataigh agus tú sa charr
You cannot buy a Lotto ticket or make a bet until you are 18 years of age
Ní féidir leat ticéad Lató a cheannach nó geall a chur go dtí go mbíonn tú 18 mbliana d’aois
Under the Betting Act 1931 it is an offence for a child under age 18 to be in a bookmakers
Faoin Acht um Chearrbhachas 1931, is cion é do leanaí a bheith i siopa geallghlacadóra ar bith
However, under the Gaming and Lotteries Act 1956 you can engage in gaming at an amusement hall or funfair from the age of 16
Mar sin féin, faoin Acht um Chearrbhachas agus Crannchuir 1956 féadfar a bheith i mbun cearrbhachais i halla siamsaíochta nó ag aonach siamsaíochta ag 16 bliana d’aois
Films, videos and computer games
Scannáin, físeáin agus cluichí ríomhaire
What films you can watch in the cinema depends on the film’s classification
Bíonn na scannáin is féidir leat a fheiceáil sa phictiúrlann ag brath ar rangúchán na scannán sin
The film classifications currently in use are as follows:
Seo a leanas na rangúcháin scannán atá in úsáid faoi láthair:
• G: The film is suitable for everyone including children of school going age
• G: Tá an scannán feiliúnach do gach duine lena n-áirítear leanaí atá ar aois scoile
• PG: While the film may be watched by unaccompanied children, parental guidance is recommended as to its suitability for children under 12 years of age
• PG: Cé gur féidir le leanaí breathnú ar an scannán gan tionlacan, moltar treoir tuismitheora a bheith i gceist maidir le feiliúnacht an ábhair do leanaí faoi bhun 12 bliana d’aois
• 12A: While the film is considered suitable only for children aged 12 or over, a child under age 12 may be admitted to see the film if he/she is accompanied by a parent or guardian

• 12A: Cé go meastar an scannán a bheith feiliúnach do leanaí atá 12 bliana d’aois nó níos sine, féadfar leanbh faoi bhun 12 bliana d’aois a scaoileadh isteach chun breathnú ar an scannán má bhíonn sé/sí faoi thionlacan tuismitheora nó caomhnóra
• 15A: While the film is considered suitable only for children aged 15 or over, a child under age 15 may be admitted to see the film if he/she is accompanied by a parent or guardian

• 15A: Cé go meastar an scannán a bheith feiliúnach do leanaí atá 15 bliana d’aois nó níos sine, féadfar leanbh faoi bhun 15 bliana d’aois a scaoileadh isteach chun breathnú ar an scannán má bhíonn sé/sí faoi thionlacan tuismitheora nó caomhnóra
• 16: The film is considered to be suitable for children aged 16 or over
• 16: Meastar go bhfuil an scannán feiliúnach do leanaí atá 16 bliana d’aois nó níos sine
Children under this age cannot be admitted to screenings
Ní féidir cead isteach chuig an scannán a cheadú do leanaí faoin aois sin
• 18: The film is considered suitable for persons age 18 or over
• 18: Meastar go bhfuil an scannán feiliúnach do dhaoine atá 18 mbliana d’aois nó níos sine
Further information is available in our document, Censorship of films in Ireland
Tuilleadh eolais ar fáil inár ndoiciméad, Cinsearacht ar scannáin in Éirinn
A similar classification system is used for renting or buying Videos and DVDs:
Úsáidtear córas rangúcháin den chineál céanna maidir le Físeáin agus DVDanna a fháil ar cíos nó a cheannach:
• G: The video/DVD is suitable for viewers generally
• G: Tá an físeán/DVD feiliúnach don lucht féachana go ginearálta
• PG: The video/DVD is suitable for viewers generally, but parental guidance is recommended for children under 12
• PG: Tá an físeán/DVD feiliúnach don lucht féachana go ginearálta, ach moltar tionlacan tuismitheora do leanaí faoi bhun 12 bliana d’aois
• 12: The video/DVD is suitable for people aged 12 or over
• 12: Tá an físeán/DVD feiliúnach do dhaoine atá 12 bliana d’aois nó níos sine
• 15: The video/DVD is suitable for people aged 15 or over
• 15: Tá an físeán/DVD feiliúnach do dhaoine atá 15 bliana d’aois nó níos sine
• 18: The video/DVD is suitable for persons age 18 or over
• 18: Tá an físeán/DVD feiliúnach do dhaoine atá 18 mbliana d’aois nó níos sine
Further information is available in our document, Censorship of video and DVD recordings
Tuilleadh eolais ar fáil inár ndoiciméad, Cinsearacht ar thaifid físeáin agus DVD
Ireland uses the Pan-European Game Information (PEGI) age rating system for the classification of computer games
Úsáidtear an Córas Uile-Eorpach Faisnéise do Chluichí (PEGI) in Éirinn - córas rátála de réir aoise maidir le rangúchán cluichí aoise
It is a voluntary system that retailers selling computer games are expected to follow
Is córas deonach é a bhíonn le leanúint ag miondíoltóirí cluichí ríomhairí
The classifications are as follows:
Seo a leanas na réimsí rangúcháin:
• 3+: The game content is suitable for all age groups
• 3+: Ábhar an chluiche feiliúnach do gach aoisghrúpa
• 7+: The game content is suitable for children aged 7 or over
• 7+: Ábhar an chluiche feiliúnach do leanaí atá 7 mbliana d’aois nó níos sine
• 12+: The game content is suitable for children aged 12 or over
• 12+: Ábhar an chluiche feiliúnach do leanaí atá 12 bliana d’aois nó níos sine
• 16+: The game content is suitable for children aged 16 or over
• 16+: Ábhar an chluiche feiliúnach do leanaí atá 16 bliana d’aois nó níos sine
• 18+: The game content is suitable for people aged 18 or over
• 18+: Ábhar an chluiche feiliúnach do leanaí atá 18 mbliana d’aois nó níos sine
The age rating does not take into account the difficulty level or skills required to play a game
Ní thógann an rátáil aoise an leibhéal deacrachta nó scileanna a bhíonn ag teastáil chun an cluiche a imirt san áireamh
Under the Control of Dogs Act 1986 you cannot keep a dog unless you have a dog licence for it
Faoin Acht um Rialú Madraí 1986, ní féidir madra a choinneáil gan cheadúnas madraí
A local authority does not issue a dog licence to anyone under 16 years of age
Ní eisíonn údarás áitiúil ceadúnas madraí ar dhuine ar bith atá faoi bhun 16 bliana d’aois
If you have your dog out in public you must keep it under control, such as on a lead
Caithfear madra a choinneáil faoi shrian nuair atá siad amuigh go poiblí - trí choniall mar shampla
Certain breeds of dog must be muzzled at all times in public
Caithfidh béalgharda a bheith ar phóir madraí áirithe i gcónaí nuair atá siad amuigh go poiblí
These dogs must be led by someone over the age of 16 and kept on a strong chain or lead that is no longer than 2 metres
Caithfidh na madraí sin a bheith faoi stiúir duine atá níos sine ná 16 bliana d’aois agus coinnithe ar shlabhra nó coniall láidir nach bhfuil níos faide ná 2 mhéadar
You do not require a licence to own other pets and there is no legislation specifying a minimum age at which you can own a pet
Níl aon riachtanas ann ceadúnas a bheith agat do pheataí eile agus níl aon reachtaíocht a shonraíonn aois íosta maidir le húinéireacht peataí
Drones and model aircraft
Dróin agus aerárthaí mionsamhlacha
Drones and model aircraft weighing 1kg or more, and less than 25kg, must be registered with the Irish Aviation Authority (IAA)
Ní mór dróin agus aerárthaí mionsamhlacha ar a bhfuil meáchan 1kg nó níos mó, agus meáchan níos lú ná 25kg, a chlárú le hÚdarás Eitlíochta na hÉireann (ÚEÉ)
When calculating the weight, fuel is not included. However, any articles or equipment installed in or attached to the aircraft at the start of its flight, including cargo, are included

Nuair a bhíonn an meáchan á ríomh, ní chuirtear breosla san áireamh, ach cuirtear san áireamh aon earraí nó trealamh atá suiteáilte san aerárthach nó ceangailte leis an aerárthach, lastas ina measc, ag tús a eitilte, áfach
You must be over 16 years of age to register a drone or model aircraft
Ní mór duit bheith os cionn 16 bliana d’aois chun drón nó aerárthach mionsamhlach a chlárú
Drones and model aircraft operated by those under 16 years of age must be registered by a parent or legal guardian
Ní mór do dhróin agus aerárthaí mionsamhlacha a oibríonn iad siúd faoi 16 bliana d’aois a bheith cláraithe ag tuismitheoir nó ag caomhnóir dlíthiúil
Information on registering is available on the IAA website
Tá fáil ar thuilleadh faisnéise ar chlárúchán ar láithreán gréasán ÚEÉ
When operating a drone or model aircraft, you must never operate it:
Nuair a bhíonn drón nó aerárthach mionsamhlach á oibriú, ní mór duit gan é a oibriú riamh:
• If it will be a hazard to another aircraft in flight
• Má bheidh sé ina ghuais d’aerárthach eile atá ag eitilt
• Over a crowd of people
• Os cionn slua daoine
• Farther than 300 metres from you
• Níos faide ná 300 méadar amach uait
• Within 120 metres of any person, vessel or structure not under your control
• Laistigh de 120 méadar d’aon duine, árthach nó struchtúr nach bhfuil faoi do smacht
• Closer than 5 kilometres from an aerodrome
• Níos giorra ná 5 chiliméadar ó aerodróm
• In a negligent or reckless manner so as to endanger the life or property of others
• Ar bhealach faillíoch nó meargánta a chuirfidh beatha nó maoin daoine eile i mbaol
• Over 120 metres above ground level
• Níos airde ná 120 méadar os cionn leibhéal na talún
• In civil or military controlled airspace
• In aerspás sibhialta nó atá faoi rialú míleata
• In restricted areas such as military installations and prisons
• I limistéir atá faoi chosc, ar nós suiteálacha míleata agus príosún
• Unless you have permission from the landowner for take-off and landing
• Mura bhfuil cead agat ó úinéir na talún d’éirí de thalamh agus do thuirlingt an dróin/an aerárthaigh
Unmanned aircraft of 25kg or more must be registered in a similar manner to manned aircraft
Ní mór d’aerárthach gan fhoireann ar a bhfuil meáchan 25kg nó níos mó a bheith cláraithe ar bhealach cosúil leis an mbealach a chláraítear aerárthach le foireann
You have to be aged 16 or over before you can apply for a firearms certificate
Ní mór duit a bheith 16 bliain d'aois nó os a chionn sular féidir leat iarratas ar dheimhniú airm tine
You have to be aged 14 or over before you can apply for a firearms training certificate
Ní mór duit a bheith 14 bliain d'aois nó os a chionn sular féidir leat iarratas ar dheimhniú oiliúna arm tine

A firearms training certificate does not allow you to own a firearm but it does allow you to possess a firearm while carrying and using it under the supervision of the person who holds a firearm certificate for that firearm and is over 18 years of age

Ní gá go mbeadh deimhniú oiliúna arm tine a ligfidh tú chun féin ar arm tine ach cuireann sé deis a thabhairt duit chun arm tine a shealbhú agus iad i mbun agus é a úsáid faoi mhaoirseacht an duine a bhfuil deimhniú airm tine don arm tine agus tá os cionn 18 mbliana d'aois
The requirement to have a firearm certificate also applies to crossbows, spearguns and all airguns above a certain muzzle velocity (including paintball markers)
An ceanglas go mbeadh deimhniú airm tine i bhfeidhm freisin d'crosbhoghanna, spearguns agus go léir thuas airguns treoluas muzzle áirithe (lena n-áirítear marcóirí paintball)
There is no set minimum age at which you can own a knife
Níl aon aois íosta a leagtar ag ar féidir leat féin le scian
However, it is an offence to have a knife in a public place without a good reason, such as for work
Mar sin féin, is cion é a bheith acu scian in áit phoiblí gan údar maith, mar shampla le haghaidh oibre
There is a range of services specifically for children and certain services are provided free of charge even if their parents do not have a medical card
Tá raon seirbhísí ann atá ar fáil go sonrach do leanaí agus soláthraítear seirbhísí áirithe saor in aisce fiú amháin má bhíonn cárta leighis ag a dtuismitheoirí
These services are generally provided as part of maternity and infant welfare services, health services for preschool children and school health services
Cuirtear na seirbhísí sin ar fáil go ginearálta mar chuid de: seirbhísí máithreachais agus leasa naíonáin, seirbhísí sláinte do leanaí réamhscoile agus seirbhísí sláinte scoile
Children are also entitled to vaccination and immunisation services free of charge
Bíonn leanaí i dteideal seirbhísí vacsaínithe agus imdhíonachta saor in aisce
In general, parental consent is required for children to have medical and surgical tests and procedures and to receive vaccinations and inoculations
Go ginearálta, bíonn sé riachtanach toiliú tuismitheora a fháil do leanaí maidir le tástálacha agus gnáthaimh leighis agus mháinliachta agus chun vacsaíní agus ionacluithe a fháil
Under the Non-Fatal Offences Against the Person Act 1997, children aged 16 and over may themselves give consent to surgical procedures
Faoin Acht um Chionta Neamh-Mharfacha in Aghaidh an Duine 1997, féadfaidh leanaí atá 16 bliana d’aois nó níos sine toiliú a thabhairt maidir le gnáthaimh mháinliachta
Body piercing and tattooing
Tolladh coirp agus tatú a fháil
There is no legislation regulating body piercing and tattooing
Níl aon reachtaíocht a rialaíonn tolladh coirp agus tatú a fháil
As a result there is no legal minimum age at which you can get a body piercing or tattoo
Dá thoradh sin, níl aon íos-aois dhlíthiúil gur féidir tolladh coirp nó tatú a fháil
Under Directive 2011/84/EU of 20 September 2011(pdf) you must be aged 18 or over to have your teeth whitened
Faoi Threoir 2011/84/EU an 20 Meán Fómhair 2011 (pdf) caithfidh tú a bheith 18 mbliana d'aois nó os a chionn chun fiacla a ghealadh
Under the Public Health (Sunbeds) Act 2014 you must be aged 18 or over to use a sunbed
Faoin Acht Sláinte Poiblí (Leapacha Gréine) Act 2014, ní mór duit a bheith 18 bliain d'aois nó os a chionn a bheidh le lamháil a úsáid leapa gréine
You cannot become a blood donor until you are aged 18
Ní féidir le duine a bheith mar dheontóir fola go dtí go mbíonn siad 18 mbliana d’aois
There is no set minimum age in Ireland at which contraceptive advice and prescriptions may be provided
Níl aon aois íosta inar féidir comhairle agus oidis frithghiniúna a thabhairt
The age of consent to sexual activity is 17 and it may be a criminal offence to have sex with a person under 17 years of age
Is í an aois toilithe maidir le gníomhaíocht ghnéasach ná 17 mbliana d’aois agus féadfaidh cion coiriúil a bheith i gceist nuair a bhíonn gnéas ag duine le duine atá faoi bhun 17 mbliana d’aois
This means that providers of contraceptive services are entitled to refuse to provide those services to people under 17
Ciallaíonn sé sin go bhfuil soláthraithe na seirbhísí frithghiniúna i dteideal na seirbhísí sin a dhiúltú do dhaoine faoi bhun 17 mbliana d’aois

Under Section 3 of the Criminal Law (Sex Offences) Act 2006 as amended by Section 5 of the Criminal Law (Sexual Offences) (Amendment) Act 2007 it is a criminal offence to engage or attempt to engage in a sexual act with a child under 17 years of age

Faoi Alt 3 den Acht um an Dlí Coiriúil (Cionta Gnéis) 2006 arna leasú ag Alt 5 den Acht um an Dlí Coiriúil (Cionta Gnéasacha) (Leasú) 2007, is cion coiriúil é dul i ngleic nó iarracht a dhéanamh dul i ngleic le gníomh gnéis le leanbh atá faoi bhun 17 mbliana d’aois
It is not a defence to show that the child consented to the sexual act
Ní cosaint ar bith é a léiriú gur thoiligh an leanbh don ghníomh gnéasach
The consent of the Director of Public Prosecutions is required for any prosecution of a child under the age of 17 years for this offence
Bíonn toiliú riachtanach ón Stiúrthóir Ionchúiseamh Poiblí maidir le hionchúiseamh linbh ar bith atá faoi bhun 17 mbliana d’aois
A girl under the age of 17 who has sexual intercourse may not be convicted of an offence on that ground alone
D’fhéadfaí gan cailín 17 mbliana d’aois a raibh caidreamh collaí aici a chiontú as an gcion ar an bhforas sin amháin
Recognition of preferred gender
Aitheantas ar inscne roghnaithe
An application can be made for a gender recognition certificate on behalf of a child aged 16 years or over if a court order is obtained that exempts the child from meeting the age requirement

Is féidir iarratas a dhéanamh ar dheimhniú aitheantais inscne thar ceann linbh d'aois 16 bliana nó os a chionn má tá ordú cúirte a fuarthas go díolmhaítear an leanbh ó freastal ar an riachtanas d'aois 18 nó os a chionn
If you are ordinarily resident in Ireland, the minimum age at which you can marry is 18 years
Má bhíonn gnáthchónaí ort in Éirinn, is í an aois íosta ag ar féidir leat pósadh ná 18 mbliana d’aois
This is the case even if you marry outside of Ireland
Tá an scéal amhlaidh fiú má phósann tú lasmuigh d’Éirinn
In certain special circumstances, you may be able to get a Court Exemption Order allowing a marriage to proceed even if one or both parties are under 18

I gcúinsí speisialta ar leith, b'fhéidir go mbeadh ar chumas an duine Ordú Díolúine Cúirte a fháil a thugann cead don phósadh dul ar aghaidh fiú amháin mura bhfuil an bheirt pháirtithe faoi bhun 18 mbliana d’aois
Parental consent is not required
Níl toiliú tuismitheora riachtanach
Further information is available in our documents on the legal requirements for marriage
Tuilleadh eolais ar fáil inár ndoiciméad ar na ceanglais dlí chun pósadh
A parent is required to maintain a dependent child
Bíonn dualgas ar thuismitheoir leanbh cleithiúnach a chothabháil
A dependent child is a child who:
Leanbh cleithiúnach ná leanbh:
• Is under 18 years old or
• Atá faoi bhun 18 mbliana d’aois nó
• Is over 18 and under 23 years old but is still in full-time education
• Atá níos sine ná 18 mbliana d’aois agus faoi bhun 23 bliana d’aois ach fós i mbun oideachais go lánaimseartha

If a court decides that the parent of a dependent child has failed to provide such maintenance for the child as is proper in the circumstances, it may order that parent to make periodical maintenance payments to support the child

Má chinneann cúirt gur theip ar thuismitheoir leanbh cleithiúnach cothabháil a sholáthar ar bhealach atá ceart sna cúinsí, d’fhéadfadh sí ordú a thabhairt go ndéanfaí íocaíochtaí cothabhála tréimhsiúla chun tacú leis an leanbh
The court may also order a parent to pay a lump sum
Lena chois sin, d’fhéadfadh an chúirt ordú a thabhairt don tuismitheoir cnapshuim a íoc
Further information is available in our documents, Maintenance orders and agreements and Maintenance and unmarried couples
Tuilleadh eolais inár ndoiciméad, Orduithe agus comhaontuithe cothabhála agus Cothabháil agus lánúin neamhphósta
You can leave home at age 16, provided you have your parents’ consent
Féadfaidh leanbh an baile a fhágáil ag 16 bliana d’aois má bhíonn toiliú tuismitheora acu
No consent is required at age 18
Níl toiliú ar bith riachtanach ag 18 mbliana d’aois
If you leave home before you are 18 without your parents’ consent and you are considered to be homeless or at risk, Tusla may be asked to intervene

Má fhágann tú an baile roimh 18 mbliana d’aois gan toiliú tuismitheoirí agus go meastar go bhfuil tú gan dídean nó i mbaol, féadfar iarratas a dhéanamh ar an Ghníomhaireach um Leanaí agus an Teaghleach (Tusla) idirghabháil a dhéanamh
Information on the powers available to Tusla is available in our document, Children in care
Tá eolas faoi na cumhachtaí atá ar fáil do Tusla ar fáil inár ndoiciméad, Leanaí faoi chúram

If you have been adopted and wish to trace your natural parents, you can have your details entered in the Adoption Authority’s National Adoption Contact Preference Register which facilitates contact between adopted people and their natural families

Más leanbh uchtaithe tú agus gur mian leat do thuismitheoirí nádúrtha a rianú, féadfar do shonraí a iontráil ar Chlár Tosaíochta Teagmhála na hUchtála Náisiúnta an tÚdarás Uchtála a éascaíonn teagmháil idir daoine uchtaithe agus a dteaghlaigh nádúrtha
However, you must be 18 years of age or over
Mar sin féin, caithfidh tú a bheith 18 mbliana d’aois nó níos sine
The age of criminal responsibility is 12 years of age
Is í aois na freagrachta coiriúla ná 12 bliana d’aois
This means that children who have not reached the age of 12 cannot be charged with an offence
Ciallaíonn sé seo nach féidir cion a bheith curtha i leith leanaí mura bhfuil 12 bliana d’aois sroichte acu
There is an exception, however, for children aged 10 or 11, who can be charged with murder, manslaughter, rape or aggravated sexual assault
Mar sin féin, tá eisceacht ann maidir le leanaí atá 10 nó 11 bliana d’aois, agus is féidir dúnmharú, dúnorgain, éigniú nó ionsaí forthromaithe gnéis a chur ina leith
Where a child under 14 years of age is charged with an offence, no further proceedings can be taken without the consent of the Director of Public Prosecutions
Nuair a bhíonn cion curtha i leith linbh atá faoi bhun 14 bliana d’aois, ní féidir imeachtaí breise ar bith a thógáil gan toiliú ón Stiúrthóir Ionchúiseamh Poiblí

Where the Gardaí have reasonable grounds for believing that a child under 12 years of age has committed an offence with which the child cannot be charged due to his/her age, the Gardaí must take the child to his/her parents or guardian

Nuair a bhíonn foras réasúnta ag Gardaí a chreidiúint go bhfuil cion déanta ag leanbh faoi bhun 12 bliana d’aois agus nach féidir an leanbh a chúiseamh toisc cúrsaí aoise, caithfidh na Gardaí an leanbh a thabhairt chuig na tuismitheoirí nó caomhnóir
Where this is not possible, the Gardaí will arrange for the child to be taken into the custody of the Child and Family Agency (Tusla) services for the area in which the child normally resides
Nuair nach mbíonn a leithéid indéanta, eagróidh na Gardaí go nglacfaidh an Ghníomhaireach um Leanaí agus an Teaghleach (Tusla) freagracht as an leanbh sa limistéar ina bhfuil gnáthchónaí ar an leanbh
It is possible that children under 12 years of age who commit criminal offences will be dealt with by Tusla and not the criminal justice system
D’fhéadfadh sé nach láimhseálfadh an córas ceartais choiriúil cionta coiriúla a dhéanann leanaí faoi bhun 12 bliana d’aois - d’fhéadfadh Tusla an dualgas sin a chomhlíonadh
Information on the powers available to Tusla is available in our document, Children in care
Tá eolas faoi na cumhachtaí atá ar fáil don Tusla ar fáil inár ndoiciméad, Leanaí faoi chúram
Detention in a Garda station
Coinneáil i stáisiún na nGardaí

When a child is detained in a Garda station it is the duty of the Garda in charge of the station to ensure that, as far as possible, the child is not allowed meet with or associate with adult suspects being detained in the station at the same time

Nuair a bhíonn leanbh faoi choinneáil i stáisiún na nGardaí, bíonn dualgas ar an nGarda atá i gceannas an stáisiúin a chinntiú, chomh fada agus is féidir, nach gceadaítear don leanbh casadh nó a bheith i dteagmháil le hamhrastaigh atá sa stáisiún ag an am céanna
A child may not be interviewed in a Garda station except in the presence of his/her parent or guardian
Ní féidir leanbh a chur faoi agallamh i stáisiún na nGardaí ach amháin nuair a bhíonn tuismitheoir nó caomhnóir i láthair
It may be permitted where there are very special circumstances, for example, where a delay in questioning would involve a risk of death or injury
D’fhéadfaí é a cheadú i gcúinsí speisialta, mar shampla, nuair a chruthaíonn moill sa phróiseas ceistiúcháin baol báis nó díobhála
Children being charged with a crime are dealt with by the Children Court
Nuair atá coir á chur i leith linbh, déileáiltear leis sa Chúirt Leanaí
The court can impose a period of detention on a child
Féadfaidh an chúirt tréimhse coinneála a ghearradh ar leanbh
Where the child is under 16 years of age the child is detained in a children detention school which are managed by the Irish Youth Justice Service
Nuair a bhíonn leanbh faoi bhun 16 bliana d’aois, déantar an leanbh a choinneáil i scoil choinneála leanaí atá á bhainistiú ag Seirbhís Ceartas Óige na hÉireann
Children aged 16 and 17 are detained in a child detention centre
Déantar leanaí atá 16 nó 17 bliana d’aois a choinneáil in ionad coinneála leanaí

However, the court can only impose a detention order where it is satisfied that it is the only suitable way to deal with the child and, for a child under 16 years of age, that a place in a children detention school is available

Mar sin féin, ní féidir leis an gcúirt ordú coinneála a ghearradh ach amháin nuair atá sí sásta gurb é sin an t-aon bhealach feiliúnach chun déileáil leis an leanbh, agus go mbeadh áit ar fáil do leanbh faoi bhun 16 bliana d’aois i scoil choinneála leanaí
Apart from detention there are also diversion programmes and community sanctions available to the court
Chomh maith leis an gcoinneáil, bíonn cláir athstiúrtha agus smachtbhannaí pobail ar fáil don chúirt
There is more information on children and the criminal justice system in our section on children and young offenders
Tá tuilleadh eolais ar fáil faoi leanaí agus an córas ceartais choiriúil inár rannóg ar leanaí agus ciontóirí óga
In order to vote in an election or referendum in Ireland, you must be registered to vote
Chun vóta a chaitheamh i dtoghchán nó reifreann in Éirinn, caithfidh tú a bheith cláraithe le vótáil
To be eligible to be included on the Register of Electors, you must be at least 18 years old on the day the Register comes into force (15 February)
Chun a bheith incháilithe le háireamh ar Chlár na dToghthóirí, caithfidh tú a bheith 18 mbliana d’aois ar a laghad ar an lá a thagann an Clár i bhfeidhm (15 Feabhra)
You are eligible for inclusion in the supplement to the Register of Electors on or after the day on which you reach 18 years of age
Bíonn tú incháilithe le dul ar fhorlíonadh Chlár na dToghthóirí ar an lá a bhíonn tú 18 mbliana d’aois nó ina dhiaidh sin
You can be included in the supplement if this birthday falls after the closing date for applications for the supplement but is on or before polling day
Féadfar tú a áireamh san fhorlíonadh má thiteann do bhreithlá tar éis spriocdháta na n-iarratas don fhorlíonadh, ach má thiteann sé ar an lá vótaíochta nó roimhe
If you are within this category, you should submit your application with a copy of your birth certificate
Má thiteann tú laistigh den chatagóir sin, ba chóir duit iarratas a sheoladh isteach mar aon le do theastas breithe
You cannot stand as a candidate in an election until you are at least 18 years of age
Ní féidir seasamh mar iarrthóir i dtoghchán go dtí go mbíonn tú 18 mbliana d’aois
• Age 18 for local elections • Age 21 for national and European elections • Age 35 for presidential elections Contracts
Mura bhfuil nó mura raibh tú pósta, ní féidir leat conradh a dhéanamh atá ina cheangal de réir an dlí go dtí go mbíonn tú 18 mbliana d’aois
The exception to this is contracts for necessaries and beneficial contracts of service which are in your best interests
Bíonn eisceacht ann maidir le conarthaí riachtanacha agus conarthaí leasa seirbhíse atá chun do leasa

Contracts for necessaries usually include contracts for food, clothing and lodging, but may also cover contracts for items connected with education and training such as school books and training uniforms

Baineann conarthaí riachtanacha go hiondúil le conarthaí bia, éadaí agus lóistín, ach d’fhéadfaí conarthaí a áireamh freisin a bhaineann le hoideachas agus oiliúint cosúil le leabhair scoile agus éidí oiliúna
Beneficial contracts of service usually involve contracts for apprenticeships or contracts with agents or managers
Baineann conarthaí leasa seirbhíse go hiondúil le conarthaí do phrintíseachtaí nó conarthaí le gníomhairí nó bainisteoirí
These contracts of service are only enforceable if they are to your advantage and in your best interests
Ní bhíonn na conarthaí seirbhíse sin infheidhmithe ach amháin má tá buntáiste ann duit nó gur chun do leasa iad
Accounts for children of primary school age are usually simple, easy to use savings or deposit accounts that pay interest and have no charges
Bíonn cuntais do leanaí bunscoile simplí go hiondúil - cuntais choigiltis nó taisce atá éasca le húsáid a íocann ús agus nach mbíonn muirir ar bith i gceist leo
You can open them with a very small amount of money
Féadfar iad a oscailt le suim bheag airgid
Accounts for secondary school students usually offer ATM cards, but you have to keep the account in credit at all times
Déanann cuntais do mhic léinn meánscoile cártaí ÚMB a thairiscint go hiondúil, ach caithfear an cuntas a choinneáil i gcreidmheas i gcónaí
They do not offer an overdraft facility and there is a limit to how much you can withdraw
Ní dhéantar saoráid rótharraingte a thairiscint agus bíonn teorainn leis an méid is féidir a bhaint amach as an gcuntas
Usually you do not have to pay fees and charges
Ní gá táillí agus muirir a íoc go hiondúil
You cannot open a standard current account until you are aged 18
Ní féidir cuntas reatha caighdeánach a oscailt go dtí go mbíonn duine 18 mbliana d’aois
When opening an account each provider has different procedures
Bíonn nósanna imeachta éagsúla ag gach soláthraí maidir le cuntas a oscailt
Some providers require that a parent or guardian sign the account opening form if you are under 16 years of age
Iarrann roinnt soláthraithe go ndéanfadh tuismitheoir nó caomhnóir foirm oscailte cuntais a shíniú nuair atá an leanbh faoi bhun 16 bliana d’aois
Other providers only require parental permission if you are under 13 years of age
